mapper.select: select VID.* from DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP JOIN VIRTUAL_DISPATCH_VID VID ON VID.ID_DIP_DID = DIP.ID_DIP WHERE VID.ID_RCT_DID = #{owner} AND DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DIP.IS_VIRTUAL_DIP = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE VIRTUAL_DISPATCH_VID SET QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID = {qtyDispatch} , UPDATED_BY_DID = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_ON_DID = GETDATE() WHERE ID_DID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into VIRTUAL_DISPATCH_VID(ID_DID, ID_DIP_DID, ID_INV_DID, ID_RCT_DID, QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID, ID_QTP_DID, ID_STATUS_SLV_DID, CREATED_ON_DID, CREATED_BY_DID, UPDATED_ON_DID, UPDATED_BY_DID) values(#{id}, #{planId}, #{inventoryId}, #{recipientId}, #{qtyDispatch}, #{quarterlyPlanId}, #{detailStatus}, GETDATE(), #{createdBy}, GETDATE(), #{updatedBy})

insert into VIRTUAL_DISPATCH_VID(ID_DID, ID_DIP_DID, ID_INV_DID, ID_RCT_DID, QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID, ID_QTP_DID, ID_STATUS_SLV_DID, CREATED_ON_DID, CREATED_BY_DID, UPDATED_ON_DID, UPDATED_BY_DID) values(#{id}, #{planId}, #{inventoryId}, #{recipientId}, #{qtyDispatch}, #{quarterlyPlanId}, #{detailStatus}, GETDATE(), #{createdBy}, GETDATE(), #{updatedBy})
